entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
